backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no implemented methods.
feature_evidence.json: Report listing implemented Phase 2 homepage features with associated files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of key frontend files including styles, config, layout, and components.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles defining OKLCH color variables, theme tokens, and global background/foreground behavior.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with SEO meta tags and root mount point loading the React app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root component that renders the HomePage.
frontend/src/components/home/AboutApproa: Phase 2 About and Approach section displaying firm overview text and four approach items in styled grid layout.
frontend/src/components/home/HeroSection: Hero section with main headline, supporting text, CTA buttons, and a decorative hero image.
frontend/src/components/home/TrustIntroS: Trust indicators section showing four metrics with icons in a responsive grid.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook creating an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and managing refetching when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Defines a React context and provider for handling Internet Identity authentication, including login, logout, and identity persistence. Wraps AuthClient configuration and exposes status flags to consumers.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides a simple wrapper hook exposing the actor and fetch state from useActor. Placeholder for future backend query hooks.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets global Tailwind base styles, custom OKLCH color variables, typography rules, and utility/component classes for consistent theming. Includes light/dark mode tokens and layout helpers.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider, then renders App. Imports global CSS.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Renders the homepage layout by composing Hero, TrustIntro, and AboutApproach sections. Provides a minimal main wrapper.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom fonts, color tokens mapped to CSS variables, extended shadows, radii, animations, and plugin integrations. Enables dark mode and container settings.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, requirements, design notes, and progress for the website build. Tracks features, phases, and architectural constraints.
